name: PBAB (Physics Based Arena Brawler)
description:
PBAB is a completely physics-based brawler. Beat up your enemies and survives waves of angry brawlers flailing their arms at you.

THIS GAME IS IN ALPHA! 

This means that the game has many bugs and is not in a fully-playable state. 

I plan on fixing these and reworking some of the systems as well, and have been steady in releasing at least 1 update a week.

I'm also looking for suggestions! If you want to help design the game and get your items in, please visit the suggestions discussion board here.

View the whole devlog here at my website, or here at my Youtube. Future pricing of this game: I plan on keeping it free through beta, and when it is finally released it will be $0.99 if I think it's really worth it. If not, it will be free. Just figured I'd let you know. Controls:

F - Pick up weapons

G - Drop weapons

H - Crossbow special fire (laggy!)
